mapper.update: update t_financial_wage set teaName = #{teaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teaPosition = #{teaPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teaTt = #{teaTt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teaWages = #{teaWages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teaBonus = #{teaBonus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teaFine = #{teaFine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teaMoney = #{teaMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teaState = #{teaState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where teaId = #{teaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select teaId, teaName, teaPosition, teaTt, teaWages, teaBonus, teaFine, teaMoney, teaState from t_financial_wage where teaId = #{teaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select teaId, teaName, teaPosition, teaTt, teaWages, teaBonus, teaFine, teaMoney, teaState from t_financial_wage
